stories.summary: Red Sox trade All-Star Rafael Devers to Giants in a surprising move.
J.J. Spaun wins his first major title at the U.S. Open by two strokes.
Pacers face Thunder in Game 5 of the NBA Finals; key player props revealed.
U.S. hockey names first six players for the 2026 Milan Olympics roster.
Giancarlo Stanton returns from the injured list for his season debut.
